mapper.select: select bno, latitude, longitude, btitle, addr from board
SELECT board.btitle, board.latitude, board.longitude, board.addr, board.bno FROM map JOIN board ON map.bno = board.bno
SELECT image.realFile, image.bno, image.main, board.bno, board.latitude, board.longitude, board.btitle, board.addr FROM image JOIN board ON image.bno = board.bno WHERE main = 1

SELECT cate.cate, cate.cname, board.bno, board.latitude, board.longitude, board.btitle, board.addr, (Select i.realFile from image i where board.bno=i.bno and i.main = 1 )as realFile FROM cate JOIN board ON cate.cate = board.cate
